title: IDK why my league doesnt work when i launch it
body: I tried opening the program once again and it stated that another instance of the League client is running but the other League tab on the bottom shows a big blank black screen. I tried waiting for it to load but nothing happen. Idk wat to do, can anyone help. Pls reply as soon as possible if you know the solution.

replies.body:
I've seen this a few times here on H&S and it's usually caused by something going wrong during the client upgrade. The steps below should result in a workaround for this issue:

>  - Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends-AIR ONLY\RADS\system
* Open user.cfg with notepad
* Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no
* Save the changes and launch League again

I hope this fixed it for you. ^.^
